Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 42 Thus , it is desirable to attach electron - withdrawing groups such as ketone or ester groups and fluorine atoms.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ketone |
| ester groups |
| fluorine atoms |

In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are "ketone", "ester groups", and "fluorine atoms". These are the only words in the paragraph that refer to specific materials, so they are the only valid entities to extract.
